subtitle: Take our poll and you could stand in line to win R500 airtime.
description: Take our easy poll and tell us what you think about Girl Effect.
title: Help us make the Girl Effect community stronger!
content:
Hey awesome girl! 

Girl Effect is the global digital community where girls just like you come to learn, explore and to be empowered! We'd love to hear how you think we can make life better for teen girls in your country and their communities, even better!

To answer our easy poll [CLICK HERE.][1] 

Or 

Cut and paste the below questionnaire with your answers and send this to us as an email to Hello@girleffect.org


  [1]: https://survey.fbapp.io/girl-effect-poll-2016



GEM Brand Survey Questions 

1.We want to make the Girl Effect website better for you; firstly please confirm if you're a girl?

Yes, I'm a girl
No, I'm a Boy

2. Please tell us how old you are?

Under 10
10-13 
21 or older
17-20  
14-16

3. If you had a magic gadget that could connect all the girls on the planet and help them be the best they can be. What would you call it?

Pick your 3 top options.

Sister
Smart Girl
Girl Power
Cool Girl
Girl Effect
Other

4. When you see the word "Girl Effect" what do think of, or feel?

Pick your 3 top options.

Opportunity
A friend
A global movement
Girl power
Knowledge
Confidence
Other


5. If Girl Effect was a person who would it be?

Your cool older sister
Your cool friend
Your cool parent or guardian
You
Other


7.Why do you visit the Girl Effect site?

It is fun and interesting
I learn about other girls’ lives
The website feels like a space just for me
I can learn new things
It makes me feel confident in myself
Other (tell us why?)

8. Tell us, which are your top 5 favourite websites?


9. How did you hear about Girl Effect?
I saw a facebook advert
I visit the site on Facebook FreeBasics 
My friend told me about it
I read about it/saw it on television, radio or online
I had never heard about Girl Effect before doing this survey

10. When visiting a website what usually attracts you to it

Pick your 3 top options.

What it stands for
How it makes me feel
The pictures
The stories
Other (tell us below what)

11. What do you like least about most of the sites you visit?

Pick your 3 top options.

What they stand for
How they make me feel
The pictures
The stories
Other (tell us below what)

12. Do you think a site like Girl Effect should only be about and for girls?

Yes
No
I don’t know

13. If it's not about and for girls who else should Girl Effect be for and about?

It should be for boys and girls
You should include articles for and about parents, too
You should have articles for the whole community
Just articles for moms and their daughters
You should have content for older women not just girls
Other (tell us below who)

14. If you could change one thing about on the Girl Effect website, what would it be?

Pick your 3 top options.

More advice about boys, relationships and sex
More advice about school, learning, finding a job, money and my future
More advice about my body, hair and skin
More advice about my relationships with my parents and friends
More real-life stories about empowering girls from around the world
Allow me to chat with other girls
Other (tell us below what)

15. If we had to change the name of the Girl Effect website, what name would you like to give it? (write it below) 


Thanks for completing our survey! 

Please send these questions with your answer to Hello@girleffect.com. Include your first name and cell phone number to be entered into the draw to win R500 airtime.
